alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:58PM CDT until June 28 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MOWER AND NORTHWESTERN FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grand Meadow, or 19 miles east of Austin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Spring Valley around 620 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Washington, Racine, and Hamilton. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 195 and 199. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
